Comments_List: This was a challenging course in terms of reading load, but it was simultaneously fascinating and incredibly enriching. It is difficult to describe the level and breadth of knowledge gained from this course; I will only say that it was substantial and very valuable to me. I feel very lucky to have been able to be part of this course.
This course was fantastic though challenging. I would recommend it to very dedicated and intellectually engaged students.
